Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory260.png'}
{3: 'The head of a Corrupted falls to the ground and makes a spin—before it disappears in a puff of smoke.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Allen', 3: "Knowing these things weren't real... didn't seem to make them any less disgusting when you see them up close.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "No, Allen. Don't even get me started.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Cut the chitchat. Where's the mechanoid?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Well done!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Emerging from the remaining smoke in the air, the mysterious mechanoid lands squarely on the ground, all the while seemingly oblivious to the Constructs closing in on it.'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "Well done, well done indeed... You've proven yourself more powerful than the data—and that, in principle, goes to show that the data no longer deserves a place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "And yet you've also proven beyond a shadow of a doubt what the data means to all of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'And now, with the cleanup calculation coming to an end, I shall free you all from Gestalt as promised.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'I shall once again review and determine the meaning... and value of the data.', 4: '1'}
{3: "With a wave of the conductor's hand, everyone is lifted up by a force they can't see—as their surroundings revert to their original state."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory292.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory292.png'}
{3: "First to appear are the buildings, then Babylonia's enormous dome, then the tables and chairs and plants in the parks, then the ground on which you previously stood."}

{3: 'Green for normal, red for errors, yellow for warnings, and blue for notes—these are the only colors that brighten up the otherwise entirely black-and-white void, through which ice-cold streams of data flow methodically.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So this... is what Gestalt is really like?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conductor', 3: 'No, not exactly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: "What we're seeing here is Gestalt with its alphabetic interface, but it actually has a core that lies beneath its shell.", 4: '1'}
{3: '"Conductor" looks up this way, its limbs starting to dissipate from the ends.'}
{2: 'Conductor', 3: 'Thank you all for your help. Farewell.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With yet another clumsy gesture of gratitude, the mechanoid takes a bow.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'When you open your eyes again, you see yourself "standing" in a quiet, dark corner, the streams of data previously surrounding you now nowhere to be found.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hi, 【kuroname】. I suppose I should address you as the Gray Raven Commandant?'}
{3: "Hearing the conductor's cold electronic voice coming from behind, you turn around—only to be greeted by nothing but the voice that lingers in the darkness."}
{3: "The voice, however, answers your question even before it's completely formed."}
{2: '???', 3: 'CW-49 has fulfilled its duty.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'CW-49 is its code in the compiler library, but just now it went by "Conductor".'}
{2: '(Why am I here?)', 3: '59', 4: '(Where is the rest of my team?)', 5: '60'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'I need you to stay in Gestalt for just a while longer since you carry an exact solution I need for the cleanup calculation.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: "I just freed your team members' caches and let them exit Gestalt."}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'And now, we just need to see the cleanup through.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory627.jpg'}

{3: "Suddenly, a pond unfurls underneath the ground upon which you stand. The water in it unreal, the swirling pond is redolent of a canvas that's been sprinkled with specks of stars in all sorts of colors."}
{2: '(What are these?)', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'Historical data selected by past passengers'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'I have included other cars to maximize the accuracy of the data selected.'}
{3: 'Like the colored beads of an ever-changing kaleidoscope, the stars underneath display the past as they all seemingly race toward one destination.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'Human behaviors and thoughts and the ways in which everything works can be quantified as equations—equations that, with postulates and calculations, can predict the future.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: "And you... are an unpredictable variable. I don't even know what state your data is in now—or put a different way, there exists an unscalable wall in between us."}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: "But... as a model that's branched off Gestalt, I need to select certain historical data to reach the best solution for the future."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "(But there doesn't exist a best solution.)", 3: '75'}
{2: "(I don't think they're going to believe in a future of certainty.)", 3: '76'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: "That's an interesting point—although that assumption doesn't stand, given existing logic."}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'As an undeterminable variable, everything you do and every choice you make has an impact on the result of the calculation.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'You are the hint to these pieces of history—and at the same time, these pieces of history have become intertwined because of you.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'You... are unquantifiable, undeterminable, and unduplicable.'}
{3: 'The icy voice echoes through the space and within your head.'}
{2: "(So what's going to happen if I decide to keep the data?)", 3: '82'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'You can certainly make that choice.'}
{2: "(Then I've made my choice.)", 3: '84'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'I find that choice... incomprehensible.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'Is that your answer? Or the answer of your true self?'}
{2: '(This is the answer of my every self.)', 3: '87'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'Again... incomprehensible.'}
{3: 'With it, the voice falls silent, seemingly both deep in thought and trying to find its next words.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'Both history and time are loops with no end, and we need a future of certain to lead humanity.'}
{2: 'Conductor?', 3: 'While I may not understand your choice, I respect it all the same.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Appearing around your feet, a ray of light expands—eventually devouring you and the void entirely.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'History... might not be all that cold... after all.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'And all... shall be kept... thank you...'}
